epics.Summary: Agentverse Foundation: Identity + Delegation Runtime Enforcement
epics.Description: Enforce AgentPassport/DelegationGrant/ExecutionIntent at runtime across all privileged paths. No privileged action executes without verifiable identity, delegation lineage, policy hash pinning, and replay-safe intent bindings.

Move from post-hoc-only evidence to live runtime safety. Add anomaly detection, runtime intervention, tool-level kill switches, and quarantine controls so bad behavior is stopped during execution, not after damage.
Maximize users: productionize MCP, reduce setup to minutes, and ship high-quality templates/docs for Claude/Cursor/Codex/OpenClaw. Prioritize activation and retention over monetization.

epics.Summary: Agentverse Trust Network: Transparency + Portable Verification
epics.Description: Make verification independent of Settld runtime through stronger transparency, gossip consistency checks, and deterministic replay guarantees. Expand closepack as a public trust format.

epics.Summary: Agentverse Operations: Reliability + Governance + Compliance Baseline
epics.Description: Harden production operations with SLO-driven rollout gates, key compromise recovery, data residency/retention controls, and auditable governance workflows suitable for early enterprise adoption.

tickets.Summary: Enforce AgentPassport on x402 gate/authorize/verify paths
tickets.Description: Reject privileged calls lacking valid passport binding. Verify principalRef, active key anchor, delegation root status, and policy envelope before issuing spend authorization.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: All x402 privileged routes fail-closed when AgentPassport is missing/invalid/revoked; integration tests assert deterministic failure codes and no settlement side effects occur.

tickets.Summary: Validate DelegationGrant chain at execution time
tickets.Description: Add deterministic chain verification for rootGrantHash, parentGrantHash, depth/maxDelegationDepth, validity windows, and revocation state.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Execution is rejected when any chain hop is invalid or revoked; receipts include delegationHash/chain summary for replay and audit.

tickets.Summary: Make ExecutionIntent mandatory for side-effecting actions
tickets.Description: Require request fingerprint + nonce + idempotency + expiresAt + policyBinding for all side-effecting tool calls. Bind decision record to intentHash.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: No side-effecting execution proceeds without valid ExecutionIntent; duplicate/replayed intents are blocked deterministically.

tickets.Summary: Publish stable error code catalog for identity/delegation enforcement
tickets.Description: Extend docs/spec/error-codes with all new fail-closed codes and map API responses consistently.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Each new enforcement failure path emits one stable documented code; contract tests fail on undocumented code emission.

tickets.Summary: Create migration path for draft objects to runtime-required objects
tickets.Description: Add backwards-compatible transition mode with explicit warnings, migration docs, and cutover flags.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Existing integrators can migrate without downtime; deprecation warnings and target cutoff dates are documented and machine-testable.

tickets.Summary: Ship runtime anomaly detector for agent/tool execution
tickets.Description: Detect deviations in tool sequence, spend velocity, payload shape, and response semantics against baseline profiles.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Anomaly detector emits actionable alerts with severity levels and reproducible evidence links for every flagged run.

tickets.Summary: Add live intervention controls: pause/deny/override/quarantine
tickets.Description: Operators can intervene on active runs with signed control actions and full audit trail binding.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Operator actions apply within defined latency budget and produce immutable audit events linked to affected runs.

tickets.Summary: Implement tool-level kill switch + blast-radius limits
tickets.Description: Add per-tool and per-provider emergency disable controls with automatic unwind/void behavior where applicable.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Disabled tools/providers cannot execute new calls; attempted calls fail with stable code and incident context.

tickets.Summary: Introduce pre-action snapshots and rollback checkpoints
tickets.Description: Capture deterministic checkpoints before high-risk steps and support rollback workflows for compensatable failures.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: High-risk flows store checkpoint metadata and recovery commands; rollback drill passes in staging with documented evidence.

tickets.Summary: Add multi-party approval chains for high-risk overrides
tickets.Description: Support N-of-M approvals with role constraints, timeout rules, and explicit responsibility trail.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: High-risk overrides require configured approver quorum and each approval action is independently signed and auditable.

tickets.Summary: Productionize MCP server from spike to hardened runtime
tickets.Description: Replace spike constraints with production transport/auth/rate-limit/error handling. Support robust host integration patterns.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: MCP server passes security/reliability test matrix and no longer contains spike-only operational caveats in quickstart docs.

tickets.Summary: Ship universal MCP host setup guides (Claude/Cursor/Codex/OpenClaw)
tickets.Description: Provide tested setup, auth, and troubleshooting docs for each major MCP host with copy-paste snippets.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Each host guide includes a working smoke test and objective success output; docs are validated in CI doc checks.

tickets.Summary: Design free-tier onboarding for <10 minute first success
tickets.Description: Optimize signup/key mint/first transaction flow with zero sales contact. Add progress checkpoints and failure diagnostics.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: New user can complete first successful verified transaction in under 10 minutes on fresh environment; drop-off steps are instrumented.

tickets.Summary: Ship template gallery for top 6 paid-agent workflows
tickets.Description: Provide runnable templates covering search, weather, LLM, procurement request, SaaS purchase approval, and dispute replay.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: All templates run end-to-end with one command and produce receipts/closepacks with deterministic verification output.

tickets.Summary: Instrument activation and retention analytics
tickets.Description: Track signups, time-to-first-success, day-7 retention, and weekly active builders with explicit event schema.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Daily dashboard reports activation funnel and retention cohorts; metrics are reproducible from raw events.

tickets.Summary: Add transparency log API for closepack/report commitments
tickets.Description: Expose append-only transparency entries for receipt/report/attestation hashes with verifiable inclusion proofs.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Clients can fetch inclusion proofs for exported evidence and verify against published log root.

tickets.Summary: Implement gossip consistency checker
tickets.Description: Detect split-view/forked log behavior by exchanging signed checkpoints across independent verifiers.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Consistency checker flags divergent log views and emits machine-readable incident artifacts.

tickets.Summary: Harden offline verifier reproducibility suite
tickets.Description: Expand deterministic cross-platform verification tests for receipts and closepacks including zk evidence bundles.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Linux/macOS verification outputs match expected vectors exactly for strict and non-strict modes.

tickets.Summary: Publish trust anchor and verifier key rotation playbook
tickets.Description: Document and automate trust anchor publication, rotation, deprecation windows, and verifier update signaling.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Rotation drill completes without verification downtime and is fully documented with rollback steps.

tickets.Summary: Establish key compromise recovery protocol
tickets.Description: Define and implement emergency revoke/replace workflow for agent keys, signer keys, and delegation roots.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Compromise simulation can revoke and re-establish trust within SLA with complete audit trail and no orphaned authority chains.

tickets.Summary: Implement data residency and retention policy controls
tickets.Description: Add tenant-level controls for storage region, retention windows, and export/deletion workflows for regulated environments.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Tenant settings enforce region and retention controls and produce machine-readable compliance evidence outputs.

tickets.Summary: Ship supply-chain trust baseline (SBOM + signature verification)
tickets.Description: Generate SBOMs for critical services and verify signed dependencies/tool manifests in CI and release gates.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Release pipeline fails when unsigned or policy-violating dependencies are introduced; SBOM artifacts are published per release.

tickets.Summary: Define SLOs and incident drills for agent-runtime safety
tickets.Description: Add SLOs for intervention latency, false-negative anomaly detection, and recovery time. Run quarterly incident drills.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: SLO dashboard exists with alerting thresholds and one completed incident rehearsal with documented corrective actions.

tickets.Summary: Publish public roadmap and governance changelog
tickets.Description: Expose transparent roadmap and protocol/governance change history for ecosystem trust and contributor alignment.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Roadmap and governance changelog are published and updated on each protocol-affecting release.
